landing.introduction.title: Seniors and Juniors Together
landing.introduction.subtitle: Let's get stuff done with fun!
landing.introduction.description: As you know seniors in IT and engineering are less available and expensive. That trend doesn’t seem to change at all. Let’s stop that madness and put seniors and juniors together as teams. Senjun teams are eager to learn and to help you with your compelx IT problems.
landing.benefits.card.together.title: Together
landing.benefits.card.together.content: Senjun teams consist of Seniors and Juinors
